heading: The Age of Hatred Persists: Diablo IV 2025 Roadmap
content: As promised, the Diablo 4 2025 Roadmap has been shared a few minutes ago! Come and discover everything that's coming for your favorite game! Don't forget Season 8 is coming soon! Indeed, the 2.2.0 PTR ended a few weeks go and while we are patiently waiting, you can check out the to be prepared for Season 8! Whet your appetite for continued demon slaying across Sanctuary with a look at our 2025 Roadmap. The Age of Hatred kicked off with the launch of Diablo IV and Lilith’s resurrection and was protracted by Mephisto’s resurgence in Vessel of Hatred. Throughout 2025, you will experience the spread of Mephisto’s influence through new seasonal themes and questlines as we draw closer to the release of our second expansion in 2026. The fires of the Burning Hells grow with vigor this year! In addition to new Seasonal content and permanent game additions, you’ll see on the Roadmap that we are bringing 2 IP collaborations into Diablo IV this year. We can’t shed light on them currently, but we’re extremely excited to meld the Diablo universe with universes that complement its dark themes. Here’s a deeper look at a handful of features arriving in 2025. Many of the updates coming in 2025 are a result of your feedback. Your thoughts are vital to Sanctuary’s evolution, so please, keep them coming. Head to our accounts to spark up a conversation with us. What do you think about the Diablo 4 2025 Roadmap? We hope you enjoyed the Season of Witchcraft with the aid of our Season 7 updates. Our focus is now on the 2.2.0 PTR and Season 8, grabbing as much knowledge we can for Season 8 to provide you the best If you haven't already, head over to our to stay up to date with our content development.
